title: Global pork exports 2020 , by country
yAxis: Export volume in thousand metric tons
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Export volume in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
The Export volume in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country EU and lowest at Country China.
The lowest value at Country China is 39.0x times less than the highest value at EU.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Export volume in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
The maximum Export volume in thousand metric tons 3900.0 is found at Country EU and the minimum is found at China where Country is 100.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Export volume in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
The Export volume in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country EU and lowest at Country China.
The lowest value at Country China is 39.0x times less than the highest value at EU.
max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in thousand metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
The Export volume in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country EU and lowest at Country China.
The difference of Export volume in thousand metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 3800.0.
Country EU is higher than any other Countrys with value 3900.0, followed by United States, and Canada. Down to Country China with the lowest value 100.0.
The Country EU has 2.64 times more Export volume in thousand metric tons than average.
